metadata.description: Rails 8 + Full Hotwire Stack skills plugin. 7 domain-scoped skills covering architecture, Turbo navigation, Turbo Streams, Stimulus, forms, Hotwire Native, and frontend craft.

plugins.name: rails-architecture
plugins.description: DHH-style Rails architecture: fat models, thin controllers, concerns, REST resource mapping, Minitest, and Rails 8 defaults.

plugins.name: turbo-navigation
plugins.description: Turbo Drive and Turbo Frames for navigation: caching, tabbed navigation, pagination, lazy loading, faceted search, and Turbo 8 page refresh.

plugins.name: turbo-streams
plugins.description: Turbo Streams for real-time updates: inline streams, custom actions, broadcasting, Turbo 8 morphing, optimistic UI, and view transitions.

plugins.name: stimulus-controllers
plugins.description: Stimulus controller fundamentals: lifecycle, values, targets, outlets, action parameters, production patterns, and Core Web Vitals.

plugins.name: forms-validation
plugins.description: Form handling with Hotwire: inline editing, modal validation, typeahead search, external forms, and the form submission lifecycle.

plugins.name: hotwire-native
plugins.description: Hotwire Native for iOS and Android: Turbo Native setup, path configuration, Strada bridge components, native navigation, authentication, and Rails backend integration.

plugins.name: frontend-craft
plugins.description: Frontend polish and UX feedback: CSS @layer architecture, loading indicators, view transitions, optimistic updates with morphing, and frame spinners.
